## EScreenUnit enum

Supported methods of describing screen space dimensions.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare enum EScreenUnit 
```

## Enumeration Members

|  Member | Value | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  ActualPixel | <code>2</code> | Screen space. |
|  Clip | <code>1</code> | Clip space. |
|  CssPixel | <code>3</code> | Css screen space (equal to <code>ActualPixel</code> / <code>DPR</code>). |
